text: Tataleuk inong yoh goh siteuboh Gohlom sapeue roh ‘oh Iheuh meunikah Jeulamee pih gohlom abeh tabri Hana peue tabri Neukheun le Allah Teuma beulanja mut‘ah beu tajok Ube-be nyang ek balaku hilah Ureueng nyang kaya balaku kaya Nyang gasien teuma ube nyang mudah Nyan hak mut‘ah menurot urof Tapubuet nyang jroh raya phaedah
